21.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H8559.def: = a type of palm tree, which reaches a height of 10-20 m and has a cluster of large leaves at the top; ◄ Phoenix dactylifera; ► it is cultivated for its edible sweet fruit, about the size of a human thumb, which grows in clusters; ≈ it is symbol of elegance and grace

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H2030.def: = state in which someone is pregnant

H2183.def: = action by which humans engage in prostitution; ≈ associated with unfaithfulness

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H8313.def: = process by which an object is consumed by fire

H2858.def: = engraved object; ◄ made out of metal; ► used to make a mark denoting ownership, approval, or closure of something (normally done by pressing into clay or heated wax and usually attached to a document or letter); sometimes worn on a chain around the neck, or in the form of a ring on one's hand; ≈ regarded as valuable and associated with exclusivity

H6616.def: = relatively thin cord ◄ made of cotton, wool, flax or precious metal; ► used for attaching objects to clothes, hanging small objects around the neck, measuring, tying, etc.

H7956.def: = man, possibly to be identified with {L:Shiloh<SDBH:שִׁילֹה>}; ◄ third son of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}
